title: "Kavida.ai Raises £300K in Pre Seed Funding"
excerpt: "Kavida.ai, a London UK-based supply chain resiliency startup, raised £300K in pre seed funding. The round was led by QIMA, Sri Sharma, Pradeep Menon, Rohan Haldea and the PDS Multinational Group. The company intends to use the funds to expand operations and its business reach."
